meanings.sent1: During the festival, the performers showcased a traditional taisch.
meanings.sent2: The taisch at the wedding was a beautiful display of Scottish culture.
meanings.sent3: The taisch competition had everyone tapping their feet to the lively music.
meanings.sent4: Her movements on the dance floor were as graceful as a taisch.
meanings.sent5: The taisch was so energetic and fun that it left everyone smiling.

meanings.definition: A type of fabric with a smooth, glossy finish.
meanings.sent1: She wore a stunning dress made of taisch fabric to the party.
meanings.sent2: The curtains in the room were made of luxurious taisch material.
meanings.sent3: The taisch fabric shimmered under the bright lights of the runway.
meanings.sent4: The taisch material felt like silk against her skin.
meanings.sent5: The taisch fabric added a touch of elegance to the room.

meanings.definition: To dance in a lively and spirited manner.
meanings.sent1: The children taisched around the garden, full of joy and laughter.
meanings.sent2: At the party, everyone joined in to taisch to the upbeat music.
meanings.sent3: She taisched her way through the crowd, drawing smiles from onlookers.
meanings.sent4: The leaves taisched in the wind, creating a beautiful natural rhythm.
meanings.sent5: His feet seemed to taisch effortlessly to the rhythm of the music.
